name: Flower Paradise
summary: Welcome to Flower Paradise! Solve your way through unique flower puzzles in order to turn a patch of dirt into your own beautiful garden! Customize your garden with flowers, plants, birds, butterflies, fish, hedges, statues and more as you unlock each feature using your Match 3 skills. Once you have your garden exactly the way you like it, you can turn it into wallpaper for your desktop, or even an animated screensaver!
